attributes.action: pit the resolve of MP's who think they are the aggrieved party in the expenses scandal with that of their electorate by calling a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Legg decisions have enraged MP's. The public as an entity have not had the opportunity to express their anger with their incumbent MP. The answer is to allow the electorate to pass their verdict on their MP in an election. Please attend the Palace and call a General Election.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
